Params: {2: '???', 3: 'Leader Leader Leader Chief Boss Capt. Leader Leader! How should I pose with my hands?! Man, this thing is so tight... Girl Constructs have it rough...'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "We can't do anything about your voice right now. Try to speak less."}
{2: 'Beautiful Woman', 3: 'Argh... No talking? But I want to talk... Is there something we can do about this, Capt?!'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "You're eighth on the roster. You're next."}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "Go prepare at the stage, but don't do anything rash. There is something wrong with the mechanical puppet performers here."}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "The special device shows that the mechanical puppets are installed with attack modules. I'll eliminate the threats off-stage one by one in a moment."}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'And be sure to switch to the team channel, and do not approach the target until you receive my call. This trade fair is our only chance.'}
